caption:
This photograph captures a scene of winter outdoor activity, likely at a ski resort. The image shows a group of people gathered around a picnic table covered with snow. On the table, various food items are spread out, suggesting a meal or snack during a break from skiing. One man, positioned on the left side of the frame, drinks from a cup while standing, wearing a striped ski suit and holding ski poles. In the center, another man is seated at the table, conversing with a child sitting opposite him. The child is dressed in a warm ski outfit. On the right, another person in winter attire stands near the table. 

The background features snowy evergreen trees and a faint view of ski lifts, indicating a mountainous landscape typical of ski resort areas. The atmosphere is casual and leisurely, with the individuals appearing to be enjoying their time together amidst a snowy setting. The snowy conditions and winter gear suggest this photo was taken during the colder months, intended to capture a moment of relaxation and social interaction during a day of skiing.
title: Lunch at 11,250 feet--the ski patrol shelter at the top of Vail mountain
